Hello Steam Community, this game is something you can play all night and day and just enjoy it. Some of us experience not the best things while even prime - cheaters, -rep opponents and toxic teammates, but even so I recommend making a Anti-Cheat as FaceIT requires for us to download, but still many matches are still hilarious Nd fun with many and many friends. ;)
Have some nice laughs and enjoy!
-Signed by NGL_Ap0xy
